name: Smartwool Merino 150 Boxer Briefs - Men's
description: Add this amazing wool and polyester base to your ski layers or hiking setup. The naturally high-tech merino wool maintains warmth and controls odours, and the polyester wicks wetness and adds durability to the fabric. In cool or damp conditions, merino wool is an unbeatable material for holding warmth and creating next-to-skin comfort.Made of circular-knit merino wool jersey and nylon blend that naturally controls odour.Wide elastic waistband for comfort.Fully functional fly.Flatlock seam construction minimizes chafing.4.75in. inseam in size medium.
